member.name: EMRPIXELFORMAT
member.summary: The EMRPIXELFORMAT structure contains the members for the enhanced metafile record. The pixel format information in refers to this structure.

member.name: EMRPIXELFORMAT.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRPIXELFORMAT.pfd
member.summary: A structure, which describes the pixel format.
